languages.text: "Когда придет время, мы встанем несокрушимой стеной на пути скверны, что охватила этот мир. Мы не отдадим Архиврагу больше и пяди!"
"When the time comes, we will stand as an indestructible wall against the corruption that has engulfed this world. We will not give the Archenemy another inch!"
languages.original_text: "Когда придет время, мы встанем несокрушимой стеной на пути скверны, что охватила этот мир. Мы не отдадим Архиврагу больше и пяди!"

traits.locale_text: "When the time comes, we will stand as an indestructible wall against the corruption that has engulfed this world. We will not give the Archenemy another inch!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "When the time comes, we will stand as an indestructible wall against the corruption that has engulfed this world. We will not give the Archenemy another inch!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "When the time comes, we will stand as an indestructible wall against the corruption that has engulfed this world. We will not give the Archenemy another inch!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "When the time comes, we will stand as an indestructible wall against the corruption that has engulfed this world. We will not give the Archenemy another inch!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “当决战到来时，我们将会站在那里，如同坚不可摧的高墙，阻止腐化吞噬这个世界。我们决不会向混沌大敌让步！”
languages.original_text: "When the time comes, we will stand as an indestructible wall against the corruption that has engulfed this world. We will not give the Archenemy another inch!"

traits.locale_text: “当决战到来时，我们将会站在那里，如同坚不可摧的高墙，阻止腐化吞噬这个世界。我们决不会向混沌大敌让步！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Quand le moment viendra, nous formerons un mur indestructible contre la corruption qui a englouti ce monde. Nous ne permettrons pas au Grand Ennemi de conquérir un centimètre de plus ! »
languages.original_text: "When the time comes, we will stand as an indestructible wall against the corruption that has engulfed this world. We will not give the Archenemy another inch!"

traits.locale_text: « Quand le moment viendra, nous formerons un mur indestructible contre la corruption qui a englouti ce monde. Nous ne permettrons pas au Grand Ennemi de conquérir un centimètre de plus ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Cuando llegue el momento, seremos un muro inquebrantable contra la corrupción que ha devorado ese mundo. ¡No cederemos ni un palmo más ante el Archienemigo!».
languages.original_text: "When the time comes, we will stand as an indestructible wall against the corruption that has engulfed this world. We will not give the Archenemy another inch!"

traits.locale_text: «Cuando llegue el momento, seremos un muro inquebrantable contra la corrupción que ha devorado ese mundo. ¡No cederemos ni un palmo más ante el Archienemigo!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「時が来れば、私たちは壊せぬ壁としてこの星を包む腐敗に立ちはだかる。渾沌の勢力をもう1ミリたりとも進ませやしない！」
languages.original_text: "When the time comes, we will stand as an indestructible wall against the corruption that has engulfed this world. We will not give the Archenemy another inch!"

traits.locale_text: 「時が来れば、私たちは壊せぬ壁としてこの星を包む腐敗に立ちはだかる。渾沌の勢力をもう1ミリたりとも進ませやしない！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Wenn die Zeit kommt, werden wir uns wie ein unzerstörbarer Wall gegen die Korruption stellen, die diese Welt im Griff hat. Wir werden dem Erzfeind keinen weiteren Zentimeter gewähren!"
languages.original_text: "When the time comes, we will stand as an indestructible wall against the corruption that has engulfed this world. We will not give the Archenemy another inch!"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn die Zeit kommt, werden wir uns wie ein unzerstörbarer Wall gegen die Korruption stellen, die diese Welt im Griff hat. Wir werden dem Erzfeind keinen weiteren Zentimeter gewähren!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "When the time comes, we will stand as an indestructible wall against the corruption that has engulfed this world. We will not give the Archenemy another inch!"

languages.text: "Vakti geldiğinde, bu dünyayı saran yozluğa karşı yıkılmaz bir duvar olacağız. Şerbaşı, bir arpa boyu kadar toprağı daha eline geçiremeyecek."
languages.original_text: "When the time comes, we will stand as an indestructible wall against the corruption that has engulfed this world. We will not give the Archenemy another inch!"

traits.locale_text: "Vakti geldiğinde, bu dünyayı saran yozluğa karşı yıkılmaz bir duvar olacağız. Şerbaşı, bir arpa boyu kadar toprağı daha eline geçiremeyecek."
